docs.snippet: Robinson Cano’s power numbers are down, but his batting average is up with the offensively challenged Mariners....
docs.lead_paragraph: Robinson Cano’s power numbers are down, but his batting average is up with the offensively challenged Mariners.
docs.abstract: Michael Powell Sports of The Times column; Seattle Mariners second baseman Robinson Cano, who left New York Yankees in off-season with much criticism, has helped the Mariners become playoff contenders; Cano's home run average is down compared to 2013, but his batting average is up.

headline.seo: Robinson Cano Is Thriving With the Mariners
headline.main: For Cano, a Soft Landing in Seattle

docs.snippet: Billy Butler’s two-run homer with two outs in the eighth inning sent the Kansas City Royals to a victory over the visiting Cleveland Indians, 6-4....
docs.lead_paragraph: Billy Butler’s two-run homer with two outs in the eighth inning sent the Kansas City Royals to a victory over the visiting Cleveland Indians, 6-4.
docs.abstract: Baseball Roundup; Kansas City Royals defeat Cleveland Indians, 6-4; other MLB scores noted.

headline.main: Eighth-Inning Homer Carries Kansas City to Fourth Straight Win

headline.main: The Faces Keep Changing, but the Yankees Just Keep Winning

docs.abstract: New York Mets defeat Milwaukee Brewers, 3-2, after Brewers closer Francisco Rodriguez allows three runs in the ninth inning.

headline.main: Mets Stun the Brewers With a Burst in the Ninth

docs.snippet: Overcoming anti-Semitic insults, the Detroit Tigers star became a symbol of how Jews were moving into the American mainstream....
docs.lead_paragraph: Overcoming anti-Semitic insults, the Detroit Tigers star became a symbol of how Jews were moving into the American mainstream.
docs.abstract: Michael Beschloss History Source column on late Jewish Major League Baseball standout Hank Greenberg, who spent most of his career as a first baseman with Detroit Tigers; says Greenberg, whose high solstice of his career coincided with peak of anti-Jewish anger in the United States, became a symbol of how Jews were moving into the American mainstream.

headline.main: Hank Greenberg’s Triumph Over Hate Speech
headline.print_headline: A Great Jewish Ballplayer Triumphed Over Hate Speech
